txt.en: Instance: Hard Negotiations
Listen to Edric and Éowyn's conversation
DNT
DNT -- Player will not see
'It was a long ride, [placeholder]. I hope your wits are still about you. Now, let us seek Éowyn...'
Edric's face betrays a seething rage
Defeat Thane Edric
''Come, we have more to speak of.'
Talk to Éowyn outside Meduseld
Following the tragic deaths of his wife and people, Thane Edric journeys to Edoras to confront Éowyn.
The glow of torches in the distance signals Éowyn's arrival
'Where is she? Where?!'\n\nEdric seems oblivious to your attempts to speak to him.
Thane Edric can be found on the stairs to Meduseld in Edoras.\n\nYou have arrived in Edoras and should now follow Edric as he seeks Éowyn.
Thane Edric is standing outside the doors to Meduseld.\n\nThane Edric is clearly overcome by his recent loss. You should speak to him.
DNT -- Player will not see
Thane Edric is outside Meduseld in Edoras.\n\nEdric seeks an audience with Éowyn. You should wait at his side.
Thane Edric can be found outside Meduseld in Edoras.\n\nYou have ridden to Edoras with Thane Edric in search of Éowyn. You should follow Edric.
Talk to Thane Edric
Thane Edric is outside Meduseld.\n\nÉowyn has arrived in response to Edric's shouts. You should wait until Edric demands your account of the events on the road to Aldburg.
Wait with Thane Edric
Talk to Thane Edric
Thane Edric can be found outside Meduseld in Edoras.\n\nThane Edric has argued with Éowyn and has now drawn his blade against her. You must defeat him.
Follow Thane Edric to Meduseld
Éowyn can be found outside Meduseld in Edoras.\n\nYou have defeated Edric, subduing him before his madness could inflict any harm on Éowyn. You should now speak to Éowyn.

'If he spoke true, I grieve for his wife and people...

'These are dark times in Rohan, and it pains me to see our people faced with such brutality. I know not when his madness will leave him, but I shall speak of the good he and Léoflad have done for our people and she shall live on in our songs.

'I know not why he forced you to follow him here, but I am thankful that you fought alongside me.'
Knowing he is beaten, Edric yields and tears stream down his face
DNT -- Players will not see
